attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned call on the BBC to reverse its decision to close its multi-broadcast studio based at the National Media Museum in Bradford.

Closing the studio would leave Bradford as the largest city in the country not directly served by the BBC.

A working BBC presence at the National Media Museum is an important part of the museum's visitor offer. The BBC should make a firm commitment to Bradford and retain its broadcast studio at the National Media Museum.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC and  BBC Trust. They are independent of Government.
